front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for System Identification in Fossil-Fueled Power Plants and Related Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: To aid identification of components and systems in fossil-fueled power plants and related facilities descriptions of systems, structures and components are presented. These recommended practices provide a common language of communication that will permit the user to correlate a system, structure or component with another organization for the purposes of reporting, comparison or general communication.<>
